description:
Head to the golf course after a hard day at work, and meet three stunning business women: Yumiko, Narumi, Misa and show them how to become a master of the golf field.


SHOW THEM HOW TO DO IT
Pick one of the available golf clubs, choose the direction, feel the wind and swing! Every single factor matters and can decide on your score. Prepare your tactic, check the surroundings and impress girls with your skills. 


DON’T DISTRACT YOURSELF
Girls will watch your every move and as you hit more holes they will feel more comfortable around you. Hopefully it won’t make you lose your focus even for a second. Admire their suits and spend more time with them later in the game menu. 


AUTHENTIC MECHANICS
As every professional, you should use all the information given in order to become a good teacher. Check the direction of wind and its speed. Choose the correct golf club for the situation. Plan your route using minimap and many more!

Remember to avoid tanks of water and use sand piles to stop your ball if necessary.


KEY FEATURES:
- Three amazing girls that will cheer you up after hard day at work
- Classical golf gameplay
- 40 maps with unique layouts
- Energetic soundtrack
name: Hentai Golf
